casebody.data:
Ray C. STEVENSON, Appellant, v. James A. JOHNSTON, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Alcatraz, California, Appellee. No. 11655. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Oct. 9, 1947. A. J. Zirpoli, of San Francisco, Cal., for appellant. Frank J. Hennessy, U. S. Atty., and Joseph Karesh, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of San Francisco, Cal., for appellee.

Before MATHEWS, HEALY, and ORR, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court, 72 F.Supp. 627, is affirmed.
